name: Death
description: Death shotguns are defined by high accuracy (at least 67%), letting them work at medium and even long range. At close range they also grant a 15% critical damage bonus on headshots, while at longer distances they can be used by keeping the whole target inside the reticle.
notes: The critical bonus does not apply to melee critical hits, so a Spiked Death is no better in melee than other Spiked shotguns. The Death title (Title_Spread_Death) is granted to high-accuracy shotguns (67% or more); see stat modifiers for how the title changes the weapon.
